XI.ii.3.C.1.
d
.
Information to Include on Notification Letter With VA Form 21P-601
In the notification letter, refer the claimant to the attached
VA Form 21P-601
and its instructions for information on the
time limits to apply for accrued benefits
time limits to request substitution, if applicable, and
evidence to submit with the claim
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C  - Development for Accrued and Requests for Substitution
